testsuite.name: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: When I choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: And Question Designer is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: And I click the Source button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: And I click inside the Source editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name:
And I enter '

' inside the Source editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: When I click the Source button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: Then I see the Font Awesome icon in the question text editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: And I click the Source button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testcase.name: And I see the icon tag in the Source editor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Test that icon tags do not get deleted when toggling between editor modes

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Test Math in editor is not causing a breakline when deleting characters in front of it ?[90m# CKEditorDialog.feature:8?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.chooseCreatingNewQuestionFromMainDropdownButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mQuestion Designer is opened?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertQuestionDesignerPageIsOpened()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click inside the question text editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickInsideQuestionTextEditor()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI enter "?[0m?[32m?[1mHello World?[0m?[32m" inside the question text editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.enterInsideQuestionTextEditor(String)?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI click Equation Editor button to open the Math Editor dialog and assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickMathEditorButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI type "?[0m?[32m?[1ma/b?[0m?[32m" in the Equation Editor?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorDialogSteps.typeText(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Done in the Math Editor dialog?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorDialogSteps.submitDialog()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI see the "?[0m?[32m?[1ma/b?[0m?[32m" Math Widget in the question text section?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertMathWidgetIsInserted(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI backspace delete the "?[0m?[32m?[1mHello World?[0m?[32m" text before the Math Widget?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.backspaceDeleteTextContentBeforeMathWidget(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI assert that the question editor does not contain a break line?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertNoBreakLineInQuestionTextEditor()?[0m
